text: Pau Donés Cirera (11 October 1966 - 9 June 2020) was a Catalan songwriter, guitarist and vocalist of the musical group Jarabe de Palo. == Biography == === Early years === Born in Barcelona, Spain, Donés grew up in Barcelona.Biografía de jarabe de Jarabe de Palo, en quedeletras.com«"En España no vivimos la música en las tripas"», en El País [...] Jarabe de Palo, la banda encabezada por el barcelonés Pau Donés. He got his first guitar when he was 12 years old. Along with his brother Marc, they set up their first group: J. & Co. Band, and afterwards Dentaduras Postizas. For a while, he combined locals concerts in Barcelona with his job for an advertising agency. In 1996 he formed Jarabe de Palo, being La Flaca his first album.Artist Biography by John Bush, Allmusic.com. === Health === On 1 September 2015 he had to cancel all his concerts after having an operation for colorectal cancer.«Pau Donés: "En la vida hay que ser valiente. Hoy estás y mañana, no"», en El Periódico On 5 April 2016 he announced via Twitter that he had recovered from his illness. However, he had a relapse a year later. He announced in October 2018 that he was to leave the music world indefinitely from January 2019. A year later, in April 2020, it was reported that Jarabe de Palo was recording a new album, Tragas o escupes, to be launched in September. However, its launch was moved forward to May 2020. He died from the disease on 9 June 2020, aged 53.Muere Pau Donés, líder de Jarabe de Palo, a los 53 años in lavanguardia.com (in Spanish) == Discography == * 1996 - La flaca * 1998 - Depende * 2001 - De vuelta y vuelta * 2003 - Bonito * 2004 - 1 m² * 2007 - Adelantando * 2009 - Orquesta reciclando * 2011 - ¿Y ahora qué hacemos? * 2014 - Somos * 2015 - Tour Americano 14-15 (CD/DVD) *2017 - 50 palos (10-03-2017) *2020 - Tragas o escupes === Compiling === * 2003 - ¿Grandes éxitos? * 2004 - Colección "Grandes" * 2005 - Completo, incompleto * 2006 - Edición 10º aniversario "La Flaca" == References == == Other websites== * Jarabe de Palo's official website Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish singer- songwriters Category:Spanish guitarists Category:Musicians from Barcelona
